In England, in the seven days to 15 April, there were 169,666 new confirmed cases (300.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 08 April, there were 248,095 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 32% (78,429 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 20 April is 18,419,203 (32,571.5 cases per 100,000 population).
